section.name: Download JAMSEL
section.p: JAMSEL is currently distributed in two formats for user convenience: a tar/gzipped install archive and a zipped install archive. Each of the install archives contains everything that Selector needs to run except for the JARs from TIBCO. If you are using features of JAMSEL that require the use of TIBCO/Rendezvous then you will have to make sure that these JARs are in your CLASSPATH.
You can find the install archives here.
